name: The Overtaken
description:
You play as a Portuguese person living in England, in a world where every person is tethered to a ghost. What happens when said ghosts become a danger to you, and only you. Can you continue living with a dangerous being following you for the rest of you life?

Features:

  • Play as a girl, boy or non-binary
  • Romance whoever you like despite gender and how many you like
  • Build your character with personality
  • Study for your GCSEs (with a twist)
  • Go on little escapades with your friends
  • Try to get along with your sister
  • Much more

TW as of now:

  • Family Abuse
  • Panic Attacks and Anxiety

Please be advised and read with caution. If you feel that it is becoming too overwhelming, take a break.
